Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class Client<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client<T>
Type Parameters:
T - is used to specify what attribute must be used for write Objects to socket.
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, Gui
public abstract class Client<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Cli and Gui classes derive from this class, indeed its attributes are the same for these two classes.

    Client​(java.lang.String ip, int port)

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      Parameters:
      ip - is the server IP address.
      port - is the server port to which this client should connect.

  • Method Details

    • getIp

      public java.lang.String getIp()

    • getPort

      public int getPort()

    • getSocketOut

      public java.io.PrintWriter getSocketOut()

    • asyncReadFromSocket

      public abstract java.lang.Thread asyncReadFromSocket()
      This method is used for reading Objects from socket. A new thread is used to do that.
      Returns:
      the thread created.

    • asyncWriteToSocket

      public abstract java.lang.Thread asyncWriteToSocket​(T object)
      This method is used for writing Objects from socket. A new thread is used to do that.
      Parameters:
      object - for Cli is Scanner, for Gui is String.
      Returns:
      the thread created.

    • run

      public abstract void run() throws java.io.IOException
      This method starts the execution of Client and tries to connect to server socket.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - for connection errors with socket.
